> Just wanted to share this site I found after MUCH searching online. It

> Hope someone can use it; my 4.5yo loves it!!!

Thanks for the link.

Dee

messages.subject: cool site for learning Spanish
messages.msgSnippet: Hi! Just wanted to share this site I found after MUCH searching online. It shows pictures of everyday English words, with spoken and written Spanish
messages.messageBody:
Hi!
Just wanted to share this site I found after MUCH searching online. It
shows pictures of everyday English words, with spoken and written Spanish
translations.
http://members.tripod.com/spanishflashcards/
Hope someone can use it; my 4.5yo loves it!!!
Amy
Amy Kagey
Usborne Books consultant
<A HREF="http://www.ubah.com/ecommerce/default.asp?sid=Z0939&gid=462366">Usborne Books Online Sales</A>
WW: -41.4 lbs
